verses.name: Amos 2:4
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Judah, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have despised the law of the Lord, and have not kept his commandments, and their lies caused them to err, after the which their fathers have walked:

verses.name: Amos 2:5
verses.text: But I will send a fire upon Judah, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem.

verses.name: Amos 2:6
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Israel, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they sold the righteous for silver, and the poor for a pair of shoes;
